Ivchepot Quickstart
===================

Ivchepot is a simple TCP honeypot written in Python 3.

Instalation
-----------

	python -m pip install ivchepot

Running
-------

	python -m ivchepot

Source code
-----------
https://github.com/Ivche1337/Ivchepot


Documentation
-------------
https://ivchepot.rtfd.io
